results.text: Do not be afraid of those who kill the body but cannot kill the soul. Rather, be afraid of the One who can destroy both soul and body in hell.
results.reason: Highlights the fear of God's judgment.
results.reflection: Fearing God's judgment should lead us to live in alignment with His will.

results.text: It is a dreadful thing to fall into the hands of the living God.
results.reason: Emphasizes the seriousness of facing God's judgment.
results.reflection: Encourages us to seek reconciliation with God and live in obedience.

results.text: Anyone whose name was not found written in the book of life was thrown into the lake of fire.
results.reason: Portrays the consequence of not being saved by Christ.
results.reflection: Urges us to ensure our salvation through faith in Jesus Christ.

results.text: But I will show you whom you should fear: Fear him who, after your body has been killed, has authority to throw you into hell. Yes, I tell you, fear him.
results.reason: Directs attention to the fear of God's judgment.
results.reflection: Reminds us of the importance of living a life pleasing to God.

results.text: They will be punished with everlasting destruction and shut out from the presence of the Lord and from the glory of his might.
results.reason: Describes the fate of those who reject God.
results.reflection: Serves as a warning to choose God's salvation and avoid eternal separation from Him.
